sentences.en: He must bear the consequences of his improvident action will he, nill he.
sentences.cn: 不管他愿意不愿意, 他必须对自己挥霍浪费所造成的后果负责.

sentences.en: Her improvident speech at the meeting has set a stone rolling.
sentences.cn: 她在会上的发言缺乏远见,已产生严重后果.

sentences.en: I wonder he should be so improvident in a point of such common, such natural , concern!
sentences.cn: 我不相信他对于这样平平常常 、 屡见不鲜的利害关系如此缺乏先见之明!

sentences.en: You will pay for your improvident undisciplined behavior.
sentences.cn: 你会为自己轻率任性的行为付出代价的.

words.tran_cn: 浪费的；无远见的；无先见之明的

trans.tran_cn: 无远见的，浪费的，目光短浅
trans.tran_en: too careless to save any money or to plan for the future
